title: Ticket #5714: DEFRAG_UPDATE_INTERVAL not defined
description: Section 3.3.15 mentions DEFRAG_UPDATE_INTERVAL (in the CLASSAD_LIFETIME description) but that macro is not defined. Section 3.3.35 defines a DEFRAG_INTERVAL, but it's not clear if they're supposed to be the same thing.
remarks:
2016-Jun-08 09:45:33 by wenger:
DEFRAG_INTERVAL and DEFRAG_UPDATE_INTERVAL are different knobs -- I'll add DEFRAG_UPDATE_INTERVAL to the docs.
check_ins: 2016-Aug-04 10:22   Check-in [48945]: Gittrac #5714: Added definition of DEFRAG_UPDATE_INTERVAL; also fixed friendly name in param table, and changed the default where it's used in the code to match the default in the param table. (By Kent Wenger )
creator: bcotton
